Anomaly Injection¶

Anomaly Injector¶

class AnomalyInjector(cloud_config, anomalies)[source]¶

Bases: object

Anomaly injector class. This class prepares anomaly objects and runs them against the target deployment.

Parameters

  • cloud_config (dict) –

  • anomalies – Cloud configuration parameters for connecting to the deployment.

run()[source]¶

Run the injector with the preconfigured anomalies

Anomalies¶

  • Network anomalies

  • System anomalies

  • Stress anomalies
